narrative.title: 102 Divisione Motorizzata Trento - 1942Q4

operations.name: First Battle of El Alamein
operations.role: Defensive operations after arrival from Gazala retreat
operations.outcome: Success - held El Alamein line against British attacks

operations.name: Battle of Alam Halfa
operations.outcome: Axis offensive failed, Trento casualties light

operations.name: Second Battle of El Alamein
operations.role: Defensive position on Miteirya Ridge, subjected to massive British artillery bombardment
operations.outcome: Catastrophic - By 25 October, division lost 50% infantry and most artillery. Division effectively destroyed.

operations.name: Declaration of Loss
operations.role: Division officially declared 'lost due to wartime events'
operations.outcome: Division ceased to exist as organized formation

situation.combat_effectiveness: Good until El Alamein, then catastrophic. Division was veteran formation with extensive North Africa experience since February 1941. Fought well at First El Alamein and Alam Halfa. However, Second Battle of El Alamein (23 Oct - 4 Nov 1942) destroyed the division. Positioned on exposed Miteirya Ridge, subjected to overwhelming British artillery and air attacks. By 25 October (just 2 days into battle), division had lost 50% infantry and most artillery. Declared 'lost' 25 November 1942.
notable_engagements: Second Battle of El Alamein - Miteirya Ridge (Oct 1942)

narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
